name: Race Cycle (Thomas Marrs)
description: Race Cycles puts players in the front seat of a futuristic race car. The player must race against five NPCs, but there is a twist to the race. Instead of racing to the finish line, the racers must hurry and collect portals. The game will start with six racers and five keys. Each round portal are lost. Collecting the portal will send the racers back to the starting line. The racers that don’t get the portals are eliminated.
